title: Bring back the smart Ping Button
body: I am a constant player of league and when I first started to play on the new HUD I have noticed something. Riot for what seems no reason removed the smart ping button that was on the mini map. Now I do not know how much this bothers other players but for me it bothers me a lot. I used the button a lot and I found it quite easier than using the short cuts to ping on my keyboard. I see no reason on why it has been removed and I would like to think that it wouldn't be that hard to add the buttons back into the game and if they were to be added again would like them to be on the mini map again. If others have noticed this please help me in bringing  back the smart ping buttons.

replies.body: Absolutely! How are new players supposed to figure out how to ping unless they go through all the keyboard mappings!?
...because the ping wheel is much faster and easier to use. Smart ping button was trash in comparison and no one used it.
